Pretty boring game. once you've played through it once or twice it all feels the same.

The game is fun for what it's worth. The only problem is that when you play as a survivor, you play by the killer's latency. If he's laggy. everyone is laggy. That hurts the survivor more than the killer as the lag will killed you as you won't know where you will be and it will seems as if you're teleporting. This often results in you running into a wall waiting for the killer to hit you. It seems that the bugs and glitches that are "fixed" keep popping back up. They don't get fixed well as the devs only make sure that you can't reach that bug or glitch. However with every patch or update, they appear again.

无法通过你的反作弊测试，错误代码1。
某次更新之后，目前这个游戏的主要问题，我之前试过很多办法，换名字啊，测试完整性啊，删文件啊。都不能彻底解决问题，只是偶尔能玩。后来是在贴吧看见有人说（原帖不记得了，大概意思是）因为国内网络用户全部是用电信代理的，地址比较集中，白天上午还好，到下午晚上全部集中在几个固定NDS,都是重复的，所以基本上都通不过反作弊测试，全部都是错误代码。
解决办法：用代理就好了。是的没错，我试遍了网上的办法，用代理是最有效，最简单的，一劳永逸的。
但是还有一个问题，就是你自己好了，系统会告诉你无法通过房主的反作弊测试……（意思是你没问题，建房的屠夫有问题）。哔了狗了。
我的解决办法：玩屠夫。以前是主玩人类的。现在即使你自己用了代理，还会被弹出，还会卡房，还会无法通过房主的反作弊测试……我现在主玩屠夫了，基本排2、3分钟就好，进来的很多都是车队（貌似车队排能有效绕开有毒的房间）。
我现在屠夫玩的越来越好了，砍翻了好几次主播的车队（不要带处决，只会逼他们速开逃跑，双擦刀守尸，主播车队一定会来救人，不要死守，故意露出破绽让他们救，就下来再砍翻，再挂，再救，再砍，再挂……一局2W血点升两个星就这么容易），不说了我玩屠夫去了┑(￣▽ ￣)┍。

This game is very good, but far from perfect.

The game is buggy, but many have been fixed. I've played this game since the beta stages and it's come a long way. The problem is it still has a long way to go. There are still many bugs, but now the majority of them don't affect the game too much.

I also feel like they're giving the killer an advantage. Basically I'm saying that the teams aren't completely balanced. I think that was an intentional feature that doesn't need to be fixed. The game itself says that the entity favors the killer. It makes the survivors jobs that much harder. I happen to like a challenge, though.

Camping! OMG! People need to not get salty over it! If the killer is camping, then don't save the guy. It's that simple. And while the killer is camping, you can power a generator or two. If the killer isn't camping, save the guy, because the more people there are, the easier the game will be.

Some perks are pretty useless.... I just don't use them, for the most part. They all are useful sometimes, though.

Overall, though it's buggy the game is worth $20. If you can get it on sale, that's even better.

Data restting? 
Hasen't happened to me yet... That's good, but it could still happen. I'd still like the game if my data was reset though.

Good glitch : I got on once and had vanity that was exclusive to YouTubers. I had H2ODelerious's Trapper mask, and Bryce's shirt for Meg, and a panda shirt for Dwight. Dwight was bald and bearded. I had some glitchy mask for the trapper. I had a mask that was just the trapper mask, but it had not textures. It was just solid blue. I also had other stuff. Long story short, after I'd closed the game, the next time I played it was all gone.

8/10

I'm going to start this off with this is my first review. I'm a horror fan, movies, novels, games, anyhow you get the jest. I stumbled upon this game while browsing the market place and read about it. Right away I was captivated with the premise of the game. So I did some research, watched some gameplay videos online and decide to give it a shot.  I came into this game with a open mind and after playing it for over 12 hours I gotta say it's fresh, it's addicting, and it's a good change of scenery from games I normally play (A lot of FPS) 

The concept of this game is simple yet fun. It seems to have a small following that continue to support it and I must say I will be one of them. The only thing that bothers me with this game some members of the community. 

My biggest pet peeve is the players who swarm the hooks right away and you can see them because they clearly suck at stealth. Then they expect you to leave the victim on the meat hook and run away so that they can help them down the second you turn your back. Wrong, If I see them lurking and not even bothering to hide I'm going to stay around that area to ensure they don't F### with my sacrifice... then at the end of the game I get called a camper because I never ran away to let you get down your buddy.  Just boils my blood when they expect a victory to be handed to them in a 4v1 match.

All in all it's a fun game and it's blast to play in a group of friends. I'm interested in seeing where the developers go from here. Can't wait for some new killers.

Dead by Daylight - это игра , где попадаются добрые маньяки(Личный опыт)

Fun, Intense and Frustrating at the same nuff said.

love the game... when i actually get to play. Dont know if the lobby is bugged, there are port issues or the game population is just too small. In any case, I just cannot recommend a game in which you experience the lobby more than the map.

The game has some serious flaws and grouping up  as premades and finding a match is really annoyingly handled.

The gameplay itself is the best out there within the genre.
There is the tension you'd expect from a horrorgame, hiding from the killer as he passes right next to you.
Hiding in a closet. He opens the closet next to you in search of his prey and leaves afterwards.
The tension is there.

If you are looking for such an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game, there's not much you can decide between currently.
I'd tell you to wait for "Last Year", but there's no telling whether it's going to be better than Dead By Daylight nor any releasedate in sight.
Friday 13th failed on every single aspect of it's game and released a completely unplayable game at a pricetag of nearly 40€.
Plenty of DBD players hoped that it's gonna profit from the flaws of Dead by Daylight, but instead it's way worse, hence the playerbase of Friday 13th took a huge dive.
Despite having sold a huge amount of 1,8 million copies, Friday 13th has even less concurrent players than Dead By Daylight now.
Friday 13th SteamDB players: 2.000
Dead by Daylight SteamDB players: 15.000

My personal conclusion for you:
Dead by Daylight has a good gameplayloop, but there are some flaws on the other hand.
If you get it on a sale, the game is dirt-cheap though, which makes up for the flaws.
Contentwise Dead By Daylight has the same amount to offer as Friday 13th.
If you buy DBD, you'll end up with the best horror-experience you can currently get in an asymmetrical horror game especially if you're new.
At a pricetag of about 10€~ on a sale, you can safely put it away after having played 30 to 50 hours, which is the time around which the flaws will start getting on your nerves.

Playing as the killer is more fun for one reason above all others: The killer is the host.  If you're going to try to play as survivor, you'll be spending time connecting to the host.  How much time?  Infinity time, in some cases. 

Anyone who's played PayDay 2 will know about how in the planning phase if everyone readies up, the game sometimes just won't start.  At least in PayDay 2, you can quit out of that host. Not so in Dead by Daylight, as once the game readies up, a person can be stuck on that loading screen for forever, forcing a task manager closing of it.

Furthermore, as survivor a person can't tell what their ping is to the host.  One would think if there's no apparent grouping by locale, at least let me know if my connection to the host is garbage so I can find another host.  There's no reason to hide such relevant information from me.

The lack of information and hours lost to the P2P system being a turd means that half the game (survivor) is going to be locked to anyone without the patience of Job.  Being able to play the game is pretty important to me and it should be important to anyone.  Pass on it until these issues are fixed.

Fun game, I love the concept of the killers, there are some very creepy and well executed designs. Overall game play can be fun, when the killer knows what he's doing and doesn't camp survivors. However, the game is played with a match making bug that makes it a nightmare to play with your friends. Lobbies kicking everyone, or only kicking one of your group members out. You'd think fixing that would be their biggest priority, but it isn't. I also feel like some of the newer killers are a little unbalanced like the hag and michael myers. The hag is frustrating because she gets 10 traps, unlike the trapper where you have to walk around the map and pick up the traps, she spawns with all of them. It's also very annoying not being able to disarm her traps. It is impossible to take the last couple generators with her as the killer because of  her stupid traps. Michael myers is also a bit overpowered, my only gripe with him right now is how fast he is at his first level. He can get to a max of 3 levels by stalking people, its creepy as fuck when you catch him, at level 3 he's so god damn fast its insane. All in all, its a good game, if they fixed the match making bug and balanced the game a little better I would be happy. In my oppinion the only reason they haven't balanced the killers is because they want people to purchase them.

[b] EDIT 2018/7/29. THIS REVIEW IS OUTDATED AND OBSOLETE, ALL THE CONS MENTIONED HAVE BEEN LONG SINCE RESOLVED.

Original review:

[b]I absolutely love this game![/b]

[u]Dead by Daylight[/u] is a terrifying imagination of Hide & Seek that is loads of fun to play and I cannot get enough of it.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Procedurally generated map tile system cleverly designed to mix things up just enough that you can still recognize key landmarks while keeping the maps fresh.
    [*]Procedurally generated level system that ensures the perks and items players can acquire will be unpredictable.
(^ [i]the combination of these 2 create a lot of fun replayability for hours and hours[/i]^)
    [*]Beautiful art aesthetic all around; characters/environment.  It's a scary world you love to look at but wish you never end up there in real life!
    [*]Extremely active community between the players and the developers.  Live dev streams [u]every Friday![/u]  They interview the dev team programmers animators etc, take questions from the players, talk over balancing and bugs, and even showcase fan art!
    [*]Absolutely fair asking price of $20.....you will play this game for 100s of hours!
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Matchmaking is still a work in progress - it can sometimes take longer than it should to find a game for a few reasons.
    [*]Also, occasionally rank 1 players are matched with rank 20 noobs.
    [*]Griefers (face campers), bots, and salty disconnectors do not seem to be properly punished.
    [*]No way to check your ping or frame rate
    [*]Can't use controller in menus.
[/list]

Watch some streams on twitch to see if the gameplay is something you'd enjoy.  If you're asking me, [b]this is my Personal 2016 Game of the Year![/b]

Thanks for reading, [u]now go play![/u]

Captures all the thrills and adrenaline of a good slasher flick. Been waiting my whole life for a game like this.

O jogo traz um novo modelo de terror que os jogos como Dead Realm e Counter-Strike de Facebook atuais jamais conseguiram chegar. Você escolhe entre ser um brasileiro na raça (sobrevivente) ou alguém protegido pelos direitos humanos (assassino). Sendo assim o jogo é um PvP envolvendo 4 sobreviventes e 1 assassino colocados em alguma fase que o Gugu Liberato esqueceu de reformar, locais completamente destruídos, decrépitos e velhos. Nesses estágios há vários geradores espalhados aleatoriamente no cenário e os sobreviventes (que são todos formados em engenharia elétrica) devem consertá-los apenas acariciando o aparelho. Logo que pelo menos 5 geradores forem ligados os sobreviventes poderão escapar pelos portões automáticos (custa colocar um portão com chave?), mas só conseguirão tal façanha se não forem mortos pelo assassino.

Caso o jogador que controle o assassino capture algum sobrevivente, o pendurará em ganchos de rituais satânicos. Nesse momento algum sobrevivente teria que vir salvar o amigo, mas certamente não vão porque o assassino vai estar ali camperando, então o resto do time nem vai nem ligar para o amigo pendurado num gancho de açougue do inferno, na verdade eles certamente acharam isso uma ótima oportunidade para ligar outros geradores e roubar qualquer item que o amigo perdeu perto do gancho.

Para escaparem da Regina Casé do monstro que os persegue existem muitas tábuas posicionadas sabe-se-lá-por-quem propositalmente para serem utilizadas pelos sobreviventes com a utilidade de descer o♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥no assassino que entra em um estado de retardo mental acima do que ele já estava e não consegue prosseguir com a perseguição por alguns segundos.

Se 3 sobreviventes forem noobs o suficiente pra morrerem antes de ligar os cinco geradores necessários o último tá♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥e vai dar rage quit ainda pode tentar escapar caso 2 geradores já estejam ligados pois existe uma tampa de esgoto de forma quadrada que se abrirá e exercerá a mesma função dos portões da glória então o sobrevivente final pode pular lá dentro não importando se o assassino já te deu dois tapas na cara e estiver rastejando igual uma lagarta, descerá até onde fica a bosta anual que o assassino faz na sua privada da morte e você morrerá do mesmo jeito, mas como o jogo não vê isso, você ganha o título de vitória.

黎明杀机这款游戏给了我极大的吸引力，我从一个从来不打平台游戏的男人变成了一个只玩黎明杀机的男人，可见它对我的影响有多大，玩这个游戏我认识了很多朋友，和我最亲密的老友一起，即使是我有一把打屠夫到了对面，遇到了他和他室友，我们PY了两波，当时真的很巧，也许这就是这个游戏带给我的乐趣吧，你追我赶，最后还是舍不得杀他们，哈哈。

Dead by Daylight é um ótimo jogo, traz uma temática de filmes de terror e é incrivel a imersão dentro do jogo porém acho que um dos fatores negativos do jogo é o fato de ter que comprar dlcs para usar assassinos novos.. acho que este deveria ser obtido através de uma moeda no game mas ok. jogo bem divertido e muito assustador.

游戏的确是很好玩，但是玩多了，不免有些乏味了，希望装扮上能够更多样化，并且，有没有办法考虑新增一些模式，例如分为三种对抗阵营？比如救世主可以压制屠夫，屠夫可以压制人类，人类跟救世主的获胜条件不同而造成三种阵营，玩法更多了，并且有没有可能出一个间谍模式，其中一个人类可能是间谍，或者增加人数，增加屠夫和人类，当然地图也会相对比较大，另外这游戏的很多绝版道具我都有收集，有想出手的朋友找我哦！
Cada vez da mas asco este juego, no olvides de comprar los DLC para tener las habilidades de los killer de pago, así no seras siempre carnaza para los que si lo compran

Отличная игра и однозначно стоит своих денег. Куплено мной за 349 рублей по скидке. Чтобы получить море фана я выбрал маньяка. Суть игры заключается в том, чтобы на определенной карте не дать убежать 4 свинушам(малолеточкам), которые должны активировать генераторы для открытия дверей) и у тебя в распоряжение есть и бензопила) и куча всяких прикалях) и твоя задача посадить на крюк каждого и проконтролить, чтобы никто не убежал) Искупив грехи ты побеждаешь. Получаешь очки за которые прокачиваешь способности и инвентарь оружия)

10/10 Топ игра для фана
输不起的人别玩这游戏，丢你爸妈的脸

Boon Totems, Doors & a busted elo system have ruined the game entirely. It's an absolute shell of what it once was - Behaviour have absolutely no clue what they're doing and have never, ever responded to community feedback correctly.

Their total failure to balance the game and make it enjoyable makes it clear that the game was good in its early years in spite of them, not because of them.
Ik hou van deze game tis echt geweldig zeer zeker een aanrader voor andere spelers
gg ez fun times
Dead by daylight ist ein echt spannendes Horror spiel das man alleine oder mit freunden spielen kann

You know, I love the concept. It was enjoyable for maybe the first hour? Anyways, you will love the game. It is pretty spooky if you are trying to hide, and get away from the killers.

For the most part, everything is balanced. I enjoyed playing the survivors, and tryign to work together to escape. That was fun.

I played The Nurse as the killer.  Fun, and can be difficult to play but the actions of the killers are slow(which they should be).


Here is what did it for me... I played about 5 games in, and oon the 5th game here comes The Hag.  This killer single handedly ruined it for me. The traps she can place next to the sacrifice hooks is unacceptable if you ask me. Should not be allowed. It allows her to be in 2 places at one time, which if you ask me, ruins the premise of '4v1'. With the trap, it allows the hag to teleport to you if someone ran over it. which basically makes rescuing survivors from the hooks next to impossible.

I am glad they allowed a free weekend so that way i can give it a shot before buying it.

i will not be buying this game.
Игра очень страшная особенно когда ты один и не знаешь где маньяк но при приблежение его к тебе начинается страшная мызыка кстати маньяков 6 это не даёт заскучать

Das Spiel ist so schlecht wie es gut ist! 
Das unausgewogene Spielsystem macht den Spielspaß etwas weniger spaßig. Das Rangsystem wird zwar ständig überarbeitet, jedoch habe ich trotzdem das Gefühl, dass es nicht genügend überdacht worden ist, aber ich habe jedoch zu wenig Spielerfahrung um das beurteilen zu dürfen.⏳⏳⏳
Wenn man davon absehen kann, dass die Spieler (Besonderst die Killer) ☢toxisch☢ wie sonstwas sind und die Spielerfahrung öfters zu leicht oder zu schwer ausfällt, ist es eigentlich ein gutes Spiel. Es hebt sich von anderen Spielen ab, aufgrund der besonderen Mechanik des 4 vs. 1 Systems. Jeder Killer ist einzigartig und jeder Überlebender hat seine individuelle Art, auch wenn sie am Ende alle gleich sind (no racesist).
Ich gebe dem Spiel 7.5 von 10 Hamburger🍔🍔🍔
